translated: They apprehend the detailed and thorough knowledges, and they become conceited because of those detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /

analyzed: snying rje chen po bsgom ste / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis snying rje chen po de'ang dmigs la /

analyzed: snying rje chen po des kyang rlom sems su byed do //

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par /
translated: without attention connected with the knowledge of all modes,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom ste /🔽dmigs pa'i tshul @22a *//🔽gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom ste / dmigs pa'i tshul @22a *// gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag kyang dmigs la /
translated: he cultivates the special Buddhadharmas.🔽He apprehends those special Buddhadharmas by way of an objective support,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do ////🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //🔽bam po nga gsum pa //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do //// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa // bam po nga gsum pa //
translated: and he also imagines that he has those special Buddhadharmas.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /🔽de ltar thabs mi mkhas pas ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe / de ltar thabs mi mkhas pas ni /
translated: Subhuti : A Bodhisattva, a great being who courses in the perfection of wisdom, how does he, when he has stood in the perfection of wisdom, stand in the perfection of giving?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na /🔽'jigs shing dngangs la skrag par 'gyur ro //🔽gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na / 'jigs shing dngangs la skrag par 'gyur ro // gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: The Lord : Here a Bodhisattva, a great being, who courses in the perfection of wisdom, does not give a gift without having stood in the perfection of wisdom.🔽The Lord : Here a Bodhisattva, a great being, who courses in the perfection of wisdom, does not give a gift without having stood in the perfection of wisdom.🔽The Lord : Here a Bodhisattva, a great being, who courses in the perfection of wisdom, does not give a gift without having stood in the perfection of wisdom.🔽The Lord : Here a Bodhisattva, a great being, who courses in the perfection of wisdom, does not give a gift without having stood in the perfection of wisdom.

original: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po /
analyzed: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po /
translated: The Lord : Here a Bodhisattva, a great being, who courses in the perfection of wisdom, does not give a gift without having stood in the perfection of wisdom.

original: sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin cing /
analyzed: sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin cing /
translated: They are seized by evil companions.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na /
translated: When they hear this teaching of the perfection of wisdom,

original: 'jigs shing dngangs la skrag par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'jigs shing dngangs la skrag par 'gyur te /
translated: they will be frightened, alarmed, and terrified.

original: sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par lhung ba lags /
analyzed: sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par lhung ba lags /
translated: They have fallen into the hands of evil companions.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said:

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig pa'i grogs po ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig pa'i grogs po ni /
translated: “Subhūti, here an evil companion of a bodhisattva great being

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o //
translated: makes them lose interest in and turn away from the perfection of wisdom.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o //🔽brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byad pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byad pa'o //
translated: They make them lose interest in and turn away from the perfection of concentration.🔽They make them lose interest in and turn away from the perfection of perseverance.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o //
translated: They make them lose interest in and turn away from the perfection of patience.

original: @22b tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o //
analyzed: @22b tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o //
translated: They discourage and turn away from the perfection of morality.🔽They discourage and turn away from the perfection of patience.🔽They discourage and turn away from the perfection of perseverance.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa ste /🔽'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ma yin /🔽'di ni chos ma yin /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa ste / 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ma yin / 'di ni chos ma yin /
translated: They discourage and turn away from the perfection of concentration.🔽They discourage and turn away from the perfection of wisdom.🔽They discourage and turn away from the perfection of skill in means.🔽They discourage and turn away from the perfection of vows.🔽They discourage and turn away from the perfection of power.🔽They discourage and turn away from the perfection of knowledge.🔽They discourage and turn away from the emptiness of form.🔽They discourage and turn away from the emptiness of feeling,🔽from the emptiness of perception,

original: 'di ni 'dul ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di ni 'dul ba ma yin gyi /
translated: from the emptiness of volitional factors,🔽and from the emptiness of consciousness.🔽They discourage and turn away from the emptiness of the eyes.🔽They discourage and turn away from the emptiness of the ears,🔽from the emptiness of the nose,🔽from the emptiness of the tongue,🔽from the emptiness of the body,

original: 'di la bslab par bya ba'i mi cha'o //
analyzed: 'di la bslab par bya ba'i mi cha'o //
translated: and from the emptiness of the mental faculty.🔽They discourage and turn away from the emptiness of sights.

original: mdo sde 'di dag ni rang bzor byas pa ste /
analyzed: mdo sde 'di dag ni rang bzor byas pa ste /
translated: They discourage and turn away from the emptiness of sounds,🔽from the emptiness of odors,🔽from the emptiness of tastes,🔽from the emptiness of tangibles,🔽and from the emptiness of mental phenomena.🔽They discourage and turn away from the emptiness of the sensory element of the eyes.🔽They discourage and turn away from the emptiness of the sensory element of sights and the sensory element of visual consciousness.

original: 'di dag ni mnyan par mi bya'o //🔽gzung bar mi bya'o //🔽bcang bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: 'di dag ni mnyan par mi bya'o // gzung bar mi bya'o // bcang bar mi bya'o //
translated: They discourage and turn away from the emptiness of the sensory element of the ears and the sensory element of auditory consciousness.🔽They discourage and turn away from the emptiness of the sensory element of the nose and the sensory element of olfactory consciousness.

original: klag par mi bya'o //🔽kun chub par mi bya'o //
analyzed: klag par mi bya'o // kun chub par mi bya'o //
translated: They discourage and turn away from the emptiness of the sensory element of the tongue and the sensory element of gustatory consciousness.🔽They discourage and turn away from the emptiness of the sensory element of the body and the sensory element of tactile consciousness.

original: tshul bzhin du yid la mi bya'o //
analyzed: tshul bzhin du yid la mi bya'o //
translated: They discourage and turn away from the emptiness of the sensory element of the mental faculty and the sensory element of mental phenomena and the sensory element of mental consciousness.

original: 'di dag ni gzhan la bstan par mi bya'o zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: 'di dag ni gzhan la bstan par mi bya'o zhes zer ba ni /
translated: They discourage and turn away from the emptiness of the sensory element of the eyes.🔽They discourage and turn away from the emptiness of the sensory element of sights.🔽They discourage and turn away from the emptiness of the sensory element of visual consciousness.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o //
translated: They discourage and turn away from the emptiness of the sensory element of the ears.🔽They discourage and

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni 'di ltar bdud sdig to can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas pa dag /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni 'di ltar bdud sdig to can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas pa dag /
translated: Furthermore, Subhuti, the evil friend of a Bodhisattva is Mara, the Evil One, who has taken on the appearance of a Buddha.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas /🔽pha rol tu phyin pa drug las zlog cing mos pa med par byed de /🔽rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas / pha rol tu phyin pa drug las zlog cing mos pa med par byed de / rigs kyi bu /
translated: Furthermore, Subhuti, a Bodhisattva's evil friend is Mara, the Evil One, who comes to the Bodhisattva in the guise of a Buddha and says to him:🔽What is the use of your cultivating the perfection of wisdom?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya /🔽bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya /🔽brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya /🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya /
translated: What is the use of your cultivating the perfection of concentration, the perfection of energy, the perfection of patience, the perfection of morality, the perfection of giving?🔽What is the use of your cultivating the emptiness of the subject, the emptiness of the object, the emptiness of both subject and object, the emptiness of emptiness, the great emptiness, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of the compounded, the emptiness of the uncompounded, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of the conditioned, the emptiness of the unconditioned, the emptiness of the inexistent, the emptiness of the existent, the emptiness of essential nature, the emptiness of all dharmas, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of the non-existence of own-nature, the emptiness of the non-existence of other-nature, the emptiness of the non-existence of both own-nature and other-nature?

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa @23a *//🔽bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa @23a *//🔽bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya /
translated: What is the use of your cultivating the applications of mindfulness, the right efforts, the bases of psychic power, the faculties, the powers, the branches of enlightenment, the noble eightfold path, the three doors of liberation, the four formless attainments, the four noble truths, the ten perfections, the thirty-seven factors of enlightenment, the three doors of liberation, the eight deliverances, the nine attainments of successive stations, the five powers, the five strengths, the seven factors of enlightenment, the eightfold noble path, the four concentrations, the four immeasurables, the four formless attainments, the five clairvoyances, the thirty-seven factors of enlightenment, the ten powers, the four fearlessnesses, the four unobstructed knowledges, the eighteen special qualities of a Buddha, the great love, the great compassion, the great sympathetic joy, the great equanimity, the thirty-two major marks of a great being, the eighty minor marks, the four kinds of purity, the four unobstructed knowledges, the four analytical knowledges, the six superknowledges, the four unhindered knowledges, the five eyes, the five powers, the seven limbs of enlightenment, the noble eightfold path, the three gateways to liberation, the ten powers of a Tat

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer ba 'ong ngo zhes bdud kyi las mi ston /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer ba 'ong ngo zhes bdud kyi las mi ston /
translated: This is not teaching the work of Māra,

original: bdud kyi nyes pa mi ston pa 'di ni /
analyzed: bdud kyi nyes pa mi ston pa 'di ni /
translated: this is not teaching the faults of Māra.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, you should know that this is a bodhisattva great being’s wicked friend.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing /🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te nyan thos dang ldan pa'i mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te nyan thos dang ldan pa'i mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, wicked Māra, having made himself into the appearance of a buddha,🔽approaches a bodhisattva great being and teaches a discourse endowed with the disciples, melodious narrations, predictions, verses, special sayings, background stories, such-like pasts,

original: skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / gtan la phab pa bstan pa dag ston to //
analyzed: skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / gtan la phab pa bstan pa dag ston to //
translated: birth stories, expanded texts, marvelous qualities, narratives, and instructions.

original: 'grel to // rnam par 'byed do //
analyzed: 'grel to // rnam par 'byed do //
translated: It is explained.🔽It is analyzed.

original: gsal bar byed do //
analyzed: gsal bar byed do //
translated: He explains, he analyzes, he clarifies, he fully teaches.🔽Subhūti, if Māra the wicked one does not speak or reveal these kinds of wicked deeds,

original: yongs su ston to zhes bdud kyi las rnam pa 'di lta bu dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni; byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o //
analyzed: yongs su ston to zhes bdud kyi las rnam pa 'di lta bu dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni; byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o //
translated: then you should know that this is a bodhisattva great being’s wicked friend.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te 'di skad du / rigs kyi bu khyod la ni /

analyzed: byang chub kyi sems cung zad kyang med /

original: khyod ni phyir mi ldog pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: khyod ni phyir mi ldog pa'ang ma yin /

analyzed: @23b / khyod kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi nus so zhes zer ba 'di lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni /
translated: If Māra the wicked one does not speak or reveal these kinds of wicked deeds,

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o //
translated: “Subhūti, you should know that this is a bodhisattva great being’s evil companion.

analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te /

analyzed: 'di skad du rigs kyi bu /
translated: and says, ‘Son of a good family!

analyzed: gzugs ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //

analyzed: gzugs ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
translated: Form is empty of a self or what belongs to a self.

analyzed: sgra ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // dri ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // ro ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //

analyzed: reg ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //

analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //

analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
translated: Mind consciousness is empty of a self or what belongs to a self.🔽Eye contact is empty of a self or what belongs to a self.

analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
translated: The nose sense-sphere is empty of the nose sense-sphere, and so forth up to:🔽The mind sense-sphere is empty of the mind sense-sphere.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //🔽lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
translated: The form sense-sphere is empty of the form sense-sphere, and so forth up to:🔽The dharma sense-sphere is empty of the dharma sense-sphere.🔽The eye constituent is empty of the eye constituent, and so forth up to:🔽The mind constituent is empty of the mind constituent.🔽The form constituent is empty of the form constituent, and so forth up to:

analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
translated: The dharma constituent is empty of the dharma constituent.🔽The eye out-flow is empty of the eye out-flow, and so forth up to:🔽The mind out-flow is empty of the mind out-flow.🔽The form out-flow is empty of the form out-flow, and so forth up to:🔽The dharma out-flow is empty of the dharma out-flow.🔽The eye affliction is empty of the eye affliction, and so forth up to:🔽The mind affliction is empty of the mind affliction.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
translated: The eye characteristic is empty of the eye characteristic, and so forth up to:🔽The mind characteristic is empty of the mind characteristic.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
translated: The form characteristic is empty of the form characteristic, and so forth up to:🔽The dharma characteristic is empty of the dharma characteristic.🔽The eye emptiness is empty of the eye emptiness, and so forth up to:🔽The mind emptiness is empty of the mind emptiness.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
translated: is empty of a self or that which pertains to a self.🔽The emptiness of what is beginningless and endless

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
translated: is empty of a self or that which pertains to a self.🔽The emptiness of what is not to be discarded

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
translated: is empty of a self or that which pertains to a self.🔽The emptiness of a basic nature

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
translated: is empty of a self or that which pertains to a self.🔽The emptiness of all phenomena

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
translated: is empty of a self or that which pertains to a self.🔽The emptiness of its own object

original: rang gi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
analyzed: rang gi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
translated: is empty of a self or that which pertains to a self.

original: mi dmigs pa stong nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /
translated: The emptiness of nonapprehension is empty of a self or that which belongs to a self.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of nonentities is empty of a self or that which belongs to a self.🔽The emptiness of essential nature is empty of a self or that which belongs to a self.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of the essential nature of nonentities is empty of a self or that which belongs to a self.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
translated: The applications of mindfulness are empty of a self or that which belongs to a self.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
translated: The right efforts are empty of a self or that which belongs to a self.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //🔽dbang po rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // dbang po rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
translated: The legs of miraculous power are empty of a self or that which belongs to a self.🔽The faculties are empty of a self or that which belongs to a self.

original: stobs rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
analyzed: stobs rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
translated: The powers are empty of a self or that which belongs to a self.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
translated: The branches of awakening are empty of a self or that which belongs to a self.

original: 'phags @25b pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
analyzed: 'phags @25b pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
translated: The noble eightfold path is empty of a self or that which belongs to a self.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
translated: The noble truths are empty of a self or what belongs to a self.

original: bsam gtan rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
translated: The dhyānas are empty of a self or what belongs to a self.

original: tshad med pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
translated: The immeasurables are empty of a self or what belongs to a self.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
translated: The formless absorptions are empty of a self or what belongs to a self.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
translated: The liberations are empty of a self or what belongs to a self.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
translated: The nine serial absorptions are empty of a self or what belongs to a self.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
translated: The emptiness, signless, and wishless gateways to liberation are empty of a self or what belongs to a self.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
translated: The higher knowledges are empty of a self or what belongs to a self.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
translated: The meditative stabilities are empty of a self or what belongs to a self.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
translated: The dhāraṇī gateways are empty of a self or what belongs to a self.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
translated: The powers of the tathāgatas are empty of self and what belongs to self.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
translated: The fearlessnesses are empty of self and what belongs to self.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
translated: The detailed and thorough knowledges are empty of self and what belongs to self.

original: snying rje chen po ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
analyzed: snying rje chen po ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
translated: Great compassion is empty of self and what belongs to self.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
translated: The distinct attributes of a buddha are empty of self and what belongs to self.

original: de ltar bdag gam bdag gis stong na /
analyzed: de ltar bdag gam bdag gis stong na /
translated: If they are empty of self and what belongs to self,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te /
translated: what is the use of fully awakening to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?

original: de'ang ci zhig bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni /
analyzed: de'ang ci zhig bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni /
translated: What is the use of teaching the Dharma?’

original: @26a *// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o //
analyzed: @26a *// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, you should know that such deeds of Māra are the bodhisattva great beings’ bad friends.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, wicked Māra, having taken on the appearance of a buddha, will come to the bodhisattva great beings and say,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te /
translated: and approach a bodhisattva great being.🔽They say this:

original: 'di skad du rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: 'di skad du rigs kyi bu /
translated: “Son of noble family,

original: shar phyogs ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste /
analyzed: shar phyogs ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste /
translated: the east is empty of the blessed buddhas, bodhisattvas, and hearers.

original: 'di la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'ang med do //
analyzed: 'di la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'ang med do //
translated: Here there is no such thing as a buddha.

original: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'ang med do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'ang med do //
translated: There is no such thing as a bodhisattva.

original: nyan thos zhes bya ba'ang med do //
analyzed: nyan thos zhes bya ba'ang med do //
translated: There is no such thing as a hearer.

original: de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng dag kyang stong ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng dag kyang stong ste /
translated: In the same way, the south, the west, the north, the northeast, the southeast, the southwest, the northwest, below, and above are empty.

original: phyogs bcu kun kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong pas /
analyzed: phyogs bcu kun kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong pas /
translated: The ten directions are empty of the blessed buddhas, bodhisattvas, and hearers.

original: 'di la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'ang med /
analyzed: 'di la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'ang med /
translated: Here there is no such thing as a buddha.

original: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'ang med /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'ang med /
translated: There is no such thing as a bodhisattva.

original: nyan thos zhes bya ba'ang med do //
analyzed: nyan thos zhes bya ba'ang med do //
translated: and there is no such thing as a śrāvaka.

original: zhes zer ba 'di lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni /
analyzed: zhes zer ba 'di lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni /
translated: Māra’s activity such as this is not spoken or taught

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o //
translated: should be known as a bodhisattva great being’s evil companion.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag nyan thos kyi cha byad du byas shing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag nyan thos kyi cha byad du byas shing /
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, Māra the wicked one, having taken on the appearance of a śrāvaka,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te /
translated: approaches a bodhisattva great being

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya @26b ba las zlog cing /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya @26b ba las zlog cing /
translated: and turns them away from attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects,🔽and instructs and teaches them with attention connected with śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'doms shing rjes su ston pa de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni /
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'doms shing rjes su ston pa de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni /
translated: Māra’s activity such as this is not spoken or taught

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o //
translated: should be known as a bodhisattva great being’s evil companion.”

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag mkhan po dang / slob dpon gyi cha byad du byas shing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag mkhan po dang / slob dpon gyi cha byad du byas shing /
translated: Furthermore, Subhuti, Mara the Evil One, disguised as a teacher or a preceptor,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te /
translated: will come to the Bodhisattva, the great being,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa las zlog cing /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa las zlog cing /
translated: and will dissuade him from the Bodhisattva-course,

original: rnams thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba las bzlog ste /
analyzed: rnams thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba las bzlog ste /
translated: and will dissuade him from the attention connected with the knowledge of all modes.🔽He will recommend to him the applications of mindfulness, etc. to: the Buddhadharmas,

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la sbyor ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / dbang po rnams la sbyor ba dang / stobs rnams la sbyor ba dang /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la sbyor ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / dbang po rnams la sbyor ba dang / stobs rnams la sbyor ba dang /
translated: and he will say: 'This is the vehicle of the Disciples, this is the vehicle of the Pratyekabuddhas, this is the vehicle of the Tathagatas.'

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la sbyor ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sbyor ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / bsam gtan rnams la sbyor ba dang / tshad med pa rnams la sbyor ba dang /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la sbyor ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sbyor ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / bsam gtan rnams la sbyor ba dang / tshad med pa rnams la sbyor ba dang /
translated: the immeasurable aspirations,🔽the formless meditative absorptions,🔽the liberations,🔽the serial absorptions,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / rnam par thar pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la sbyor ba dang // stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos rnams la sbyor zhing /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / rnam par thar pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la sbyor ba dang // stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos rnams la sbyor zhing /
translated: and the phenomena of emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness.

original: rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar chos de dag yongs su bsgoms la /🔽nyan thos kyi sa @27a *//
analyzed: rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar chos de dag yongs su bsgoms la / nyan thos kyi sa @27a *//
translated: Son of noble family, you should cultivate these phenomena

original: mngon du gyis shig /
analyzed: mngon du gyis shig /
translated: and actualize the level of the hearers.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni /
translated: “What will you do with unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?”

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig pa'i bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig pa'i bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, you should know that such deeds of Māra are the bodhisattva great beings’ wicked friends.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag pha dang ma'i cha byad du byas shing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag pha dang ma'i cha byad du byas shing /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, Māra the wicked one, having taken on the appearance of a father and mother,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te /🔽'di skad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te / 'di skad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas /
translated: approaches bodhisattva great beings

original: khyod la ci zhig bya /
analyzed: khyod la ci zhig bya /
translated: and says, ‘What will you do with unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?

original: de'i don du ni bskal ba grangs med tshad med par 'khor ba na 'khor zhing rkang lag dang mgo bcad pa tshad med pas nyon mongs par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: de'i don du ni bskal ba grangs med tshad med par 'khor ba na 'khor zhing rkang lag dang mgo bcad pa tshad med pas nyon mongs par 'gyur gyi /
translated: For that you will wander in cyclic existence for countless, immeasurable eons, and you will be afflicted by having countless hands, feet, and heads cut off.

original: gang la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa de la brtson par gyis shig /
analyzed: gang la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa de la brtson par gyis shig /
translated: the fruit of once-returner to be manifested, the fruit of non-returner to be manifested, and the fruit of a worthy one to be manifested.”

original: ces zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni /
analyzed: ces zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni /
translated: Māra does not speak or show such deeds.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that this is a bodhisattva great being’s evil companion.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag dge slong gi cha byang du byas shing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag dge slong gi cha byang du byas shing /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, Māra the wicked one, having become a monk,🔽approaches a bodhisattva great being

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung @27b du phyin te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung @27b du phyin te /
translated: and says:

original: gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /🔽smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /
analyzed: gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /
translated: “Form is without longing,” “Form is without formation,” and “Form is isolated,” and similarly, “Feeling is impermanent,” “Feeling is painful,”🔽“Feeling is without self,” “Feeling is calm,” “Feeling is empty,” “Feeling is signless,” “Feeling is without longing,” “Feeling is without formation,” and “Feeling is isolated,” and similarly, “Perception is impermanent,” “Perception is painful,”🔽“Perception is without self,” “Perception is calm,” “Perception is empty,” “Perception is signless,” “Perception is without longing,” “Perception is without formation,” and “Perception is isolated,” and similarly, “Formation is impermanent,” “Formation is painful,”🔽“Formation is without self,” “Formation is calm,” “Formation is empty,” “Formation is signless,” “Formation is without longing,” “Formation is without formation,” and “Formation is isolated,” and similarly, “Consciousness is impermanent,” “Consciousness is painful,”
